polimi.reds
Class Reply

java.lang.Object
  polimi.reds.Reply
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Reply
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class is the basic template to create a reply message. Each reply has the ID of its repliable message and a flag that specifies whether this is the last reply or not.

Author:
Alessandro Monguzzi
See Also:
Serialized Form
